page.title: 20Fiona's School Day
page.content: 7:45am Wake up have breakfast cereal cornflakes and get ready for School 8:45am go to School short playtime 9:00am we have assembly a hymn from Come and Praise,prayers and dinner numbers.9:15am Reading Time I'am reading Prince Caspian(a fantasy book)by C.S.Lewis. .9:45am Maths we are using geo boards to make shapes like rectangles and parellelograms and recording it on dotted paper.10:45am go out to play I play jumping over a rope as somebody else turns it round.11:05am written work.12:00 noon Lunch.12:30pm go out to play.1:00pm go into topic lesson we are doing about Victorian times 2:30pm go out to play 3:00pm lesson or games 3:30pm go home 4:00pm watch television 6:00pm have tea, at 8:30pm go to bed.
